result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gerald Marquis Gillie

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie in court, in custody.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court for Gerald Marquis Gillie.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a status on extradition.  State is in receipt of warrant.  Court scheduled a status conference.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie appeared by video, in custody.   Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court for Gerald Marquis Gillie.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Status Conference. Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned, Branch 2.  Status conference scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 9:00 am.

Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court, defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, in custody.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned, Branch 2.  Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference rescheduled from 07-28-2022 to 08-03-2022 at 1:30 pm, Branch 02

Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court, defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held off the record via Zoom. Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, defendant in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for status of counsel. SPD has not yet appointed counsel. Court orders case adjourned for a State v Lee hearing. Clerk notified SPD. Case adjourend, Branch 2 via Zoom. Hearing scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 8:30 am.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, defendant in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Status of Conference.  The status conference was HELD OFF THE RECORD in person.  No counsel has been appointed by the Public Defender's Office.  The court Order the matter adjourned for GOOD CAUSE back to Branch 2.  Status conference scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, defendant in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
The Court is in receipt of the Governor's Warrant from Illinois and finds that the extradition warrant is appropriate.  Defendant was served with the extradition warrant in the jail.  At this time, due to no appointment of counsel by the SPD, the Court does not remand defendant pending pick up.  The Court was advised that the defendant has a pending case in another court.  Court orders case adjourned for status conference.  Status conference scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, defendant in custody.  Allysa Bria Brown appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for status of counsel. SPD has not yet appointed counsel. Case rescheduled off the record. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for April 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, defendant in custody.  Allysa Bria Brown appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Defendant has not been appointed new counsel.  Prior counsel was Charles Roozen.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 2.  Status conference scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Charles Robert Roozen in court, defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Statements by state that Iowa needs time to extradite. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for March 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant refused to sign Waiver of Extradition forms when presented by the deputy.  Court continues REMAND.
Defendant is advised this case is reassigned to Judge Childs, Branch 2
Status Conference rescheduled for February 11, 2022 at 08:30 in Branch 2.
This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c5e6133e-7164-4e97-66e6-4c87ef70fbdb

ADDRESS INFO for Gerald Marquis Gillie
Current: 8889 N 91st Street, Milwaukee, WI 53224 United States  (Effective: 01-14-2022)
Prior: 4533 South 23rd Street # 103, Milwaukee, WI 53216

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie in court with attorney Charles Robert Roozen.  Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Gerald Marquis Gillie appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of IOWA.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Court ordered the defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/0a25f782-7319-dd31-4ed9-c0f452a2bc2b  Status conference scheduled for February 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Criminal Warrant for Commitment.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
